Name: Sunset Strip
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Eric Tecosky's original recipe for this cocktail calls for 1.25oz of Jack Daniel's Single Barrel instead of the combination of Tennessee and rye whiskies used here. Being a mix of split base spirits and liqueurs, it was stirred, as you'd expect such a combination. However, somewhat reminiscent of Shakerato , the Sunset Strip seems to benefit from the aeration and extra dilution provided by shaking. Hence, this is the method I've chosen.
History: Adapted from 2015 recipe created by Eric Tecosky at Jones Hollywood, Los Angeles, USA (and courtesy of Gary "gaz" Regan ).
Nutrition: One serving of Sunset Strip contains 243 calories
